info.title: Zinalyze Read API
info.description: Read-only API for fixtures, standings, team statistics and league coverage. Uses Basic Auth (READ_API_BASIC_USER / READ_API_BASIC_PASSWORD).

UnknownQueryParamsError.description: Returned when a client sends query parameters that are not supported by the endpoint.

HTTPExceptionDetailEnvelope.description: FastAPI HTTPException envelope. Many errors are returned as {"detail": ...}.

FixtureStatusShort.description: Fixture status_short. Prefer known enums but allow unknown strings for forward compatibility.

EventType.description: Event category. Prefer known enums but allow unknown strings for forward compatibility.

EventDetail.description: Event detail. Prefer known enums but allow unknown strings for forward compatibility.

V1Fixture.description: Fixture shape returned by /v1/* endpoints in src/read_api/app.py. Extra fields are allowed.

V1StandingItem.description: Row returned by GET /v1/standings/{league_id}/{season}. Extra fields are allowed.

V1Team.description: Team shape returned by GET /v1/teams. Extra fields are allowed.

V1InjuryItem.description: Row returned by GET /v1/injuries. Extra fields are allowed.

ReadH2HResponse.description: Head-to-head fixtures + summary derived from core.fixtures.

V1FixtureDetailsResponse.description: Merged fixture details (events, lineups, statistics, players). Shape is intentionally flexible.

ReadFixture.description: Curated fixture shape returned by /read/fixtures and /read/fixtures/{fixture_id}. Extra fields are allowed.

FixtureStatisticKV.description: One stat entry as stored in core.fixture_statistics.statistics (derived from /fixtures/statistics).

value.description: May be int-ish or percentage-like strings.

TeamMetricsResponse.description: Aggregated per-team features computed from completed fixtures and core.fixture_statistics (includes corner_kicks average when available).

match_stats_sum.description: Totals across the window for common match stats (e.g. total corner_kicks). Null when not available.

match_stats_count.description: How many matches contributed to each stat in match_stats_avg/sum.
